text: "Takeaway" is a song by American production duo The Chainsmokers and American EDM musician Illenium, featuring Canadian singer Lennon Stella. It was released as a single on July 24, 2019, along with its music video, serving as the fifth single from both artists' third studio albums World War Joy and Ascend, respectively. The single became The Chainsmokers' seventh, and both Illenium's and Stella's first, number one on Billboard's Dance/Mix Show Airplay Chart in November 2019.Billboard Dance/Mix Show Airplay (November 9, 2019) from Billboard (November 7, 2019)"Dolly Parton Earns First-Ever No. 1 on a Dance/Electronic Chart, Thanks to Galantis Collab" from Billboard (November 7, 2019) == Music video == The music video, directed by Jeremiah Davis and produced by That One Blond Kid Corp, was uploaded to YouTube on July 24, 2019. The video was filmed in New York City at the Vessel, a massive staircase sculpture in the Hudson Yards development. The interactive art installation is the work of Thomas Heatherwick. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- ! scope="row"| Australia Dance (ARIA) | 4 |- |- |- |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| China Airplay/FL (Billboard) | 15 |- |- |- ! scope="row"| France (SNEP) | 136 |- |- ! scope="row"| Germany Dance (Official German Charts) | 5 |- |- |- |- |- ! scope="row" | Latvia (LAIPA) | 19 |- ! scope="row"| Lithuania (AGATA) | 14 |- ! scope="row"| Malaysia (RIM) | 15 |- |- ! scope="row"| New Zealand Hot Singles (RMNZ) | 3 |- |- ! scope="row"| Romania (Airplay 100) | 64 |- ! scope="row"| Singapore (RIAS) | 11 |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| US Rolling Stone Top 100 | 29 |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| Germany (Official German Charts) | 100 |- ! scope="row"| Latvia (LAIPA) | 79 |- ! scope="row"| Portugal (AFP) | 573 |- ! scope="row"| US Hot Dance/Electronic Songs (Billboard) | 16 |} ==Certifications== ==Release history== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Region ! scope="col"| Date ! scope="col"| Format ! scope="col"| Label ! scope="col"| |- ! scope="row"| Various | July 24, 2019 | | rowspan="2" | Columbia | |- ! scope="row"| United States | September 24, 2019 | {{hlist|Contemporary hit radio | |} == Notes == ==References== Category:2019 singles Category:2019 songs Category:The Chainsmokers songs Category:Illenium songs Category:Lennon Stella songs Category:Billboard Dance/Mix Show Airplay number-one singles Category:Songs written by Andrew Taggart Category:Songs written by Alex Pall Category:Songs written by Freedo (producer) Category:Future bass songs
